SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwMGAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Associate			    0 MageReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30
; 1 = Apprentice		    5 MageReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Journeyman		  10 MageReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Evoker				  20 MageReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Conjurer			  30 MageReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Magician			  45 MageReputation,	Intelligence 31, Willpower 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Warlock			  60 MageReputation,	Intelligence 32, Willpower 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Wizard				  80 MageReputation,	Intelligence 33, Willpower 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Master Wizard	100 MageReputation,	Intelligence 34, Willpower 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Arch-Mage		125 MageReputation,	Intelligence 35, Willpower 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Mage = Alchemy, Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion, Mysticism

SHORT MageAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT MageReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpelDay
short DaysExpelled

BEGIN GameMode

	if GetPCExpelled fbmwMagesGuild == 1
		if ExpelDay < GameDaysPassed
			if Player.GetInCell BalmoraVSGuildSofSMages || Player.GetInCell CalderaVSGuildSofSMages || Player.GetInCell VivecVSGuildSofSMages || Player.GetInCell AldTruhnVSGuildSofSMages || Player.GetInCell SadrithSMoraVSWolverineSHallXSMageAsSGuild
				set DaysExpelled to DaysExpelled + 3
			else
				set DaysExpelled to DaysExpelled + 1
			endif
			set ExpelDay to GameDaysPassed
		endif

		if DaysExpelled >= 30
			SetPCExpelled fbmwMagesGuild 0
			SetPCFactionSteal fbmwMagesGuild 0
			SetPCFactionMurder fbmwMagesGuild 0
			SetPCFactionAttack fbmwMagesGuild 0
			set DaysExpelled to 0
			set ExpelDay to 0
			MessageBox "You have been reinstated in the Mages Guild"
		endif

	endif

	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction fbmwMagesGuild == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction fbmwMagesGuild
		If GetPCFactionSteal fbmwMagesGuild
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc fbmwMagesGuild)
				SetPCExpelled fbmwMagesGuild 1
				set ExpelDay to GameDaysPassed
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Mages Guild."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal fbmwMagesGuild 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack fbmwMagesGuild
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc fbmwMagesGuild)
				SetPCExpelled fbmwMagesGuild 1
				set ExpelDay to GameDaysPassed
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Mages Guild."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack fbmwMagesGuild 0
			EndIf
		endif
	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF MageAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 91
			SET MageAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET MageAdvancement TO 0
		RETURN
	ENDIF ; MageAdvancement == 4

	IF MageAdvancement == 3 || MageAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 0
		IF MageReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 10 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 10 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 10 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 10
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 1
		IF MageReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 20 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 20 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 20 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 20
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 2
		IF MageReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 30 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 30 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 30 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 30
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 3
		IF MageReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 40 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 40 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 40 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 40
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 4
		IF MageReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 31 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 50 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 50 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 50 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 50
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 5
		IF MageReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 32 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 60 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 60 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 60 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 60
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 6
		IF MageReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 33 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 70 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 70 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 70 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 70
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 7
		IF MageReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 34 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 80 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 80 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 80 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 80
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMGAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwMagesGuild == 8
		IF MageReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 35 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 90 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 90 || Player.GetAV Alteration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 90 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMGAdvancement 90
			SET MageAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET MageAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET MageAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET MageAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 2921 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
